name: my-first-extension
description: A short description of my extension
author: bryan-cook

scripts.package: npm run compile && tfx extension create --manifest-globs vss-extension.json --overrides-file configs/release.json --output-path out
scripts.package:dev: npm run compile:dev && tfx extension create --manifest-globs vss-extension.json --overrides-file configs/dev.json --output-path out
scripts.publish: npm run compile && tfx extension publish --manifest-globs vss-extension.json --overrides-file configs/release.json --output-path out
scripts.publish:dev: npm run compile:dev && tfx extension publish --manifest-globs vss-extension.json --overrides-file configs/dev.json --output-path out
